title: Pork Rind Appetizer (Botana de Chicharrón)
ingredients: 3 ounces chicharrón, (pork cracklings) broken into bite-size pieces
instructions: Prepare the “salsa cruda” by mixing the chopped tomatoes, onions, jalapeños chiles, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.
Add the chicharrón pieces to the “salsa cruda” and stir and mix it all well.
Serve immediately with tostadas or tortilla chips.
Remarks:  As a variation, shrimp may be substituted for the pork cracklings in this recipe.
Yield:  Make an appetizer for 6 to 8 persons.
Source:  Seasons of My Heart, A Culinary Journey Through Oaxaca, Mexico by Susana Trilling, published by The Ballantine Publishing Group, © 1999 by Susana Trilling.
